name: Flappybird for MSX
description:
This is a demake of .GEARS Studio's Flappy Bird and my first public program written entirely in Z80 assembly -- Yay! I'm a Hacker now!

This game runs on any MSX compatible computer and adjusts itself to work fine in both PAL and NTSC models. For more details and source code access visit its git repository on GitHub.

Instructions

Move the yellow bird through the sky avoiding pipes, press «SPACE» on keyboard or «BUTTON A» on joystick #1 to fly higher.
